definition: to do with difficulty/to force sb to do sth/reluctant/barely enough
to exhort/to make an effort
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
stubborn/unyielding
surname Qiang
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
to achieve with difficulty/only just up to the task/barely adequate

sentences.english: The goalkeeper just managed to palm the ball over the crossbar.
sentences.chinese: 守門員用手掌勉強把球擋過球門橫木。

sentences.english: The story creaks along to a dull conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 這個故事勉強發展下去，最後達到一個乏味的結局。

sentences.english: Yet Los Angeles receives only grudging recognition as a creative center.
sentences.chinese: 然而，洛城作爲創造性的中心僅得到一些勉強的認同。

sentences.english: Its barely 2MB, so it shouldn't take too long.
sentences.chinese: 其勉強2MB的，所以它應該不會太長。

sentences.english: Then I grudged a smile to her.
sentences.chinese: 然後勉強給她擠出一點微笑。

sentences.english: She baled up her money on receiving the bill.
sentences.chinese: 她收到賬單後勉強付了賬。

sentences.english: The big ship barely skinned through the open draw.
sentences.chinese: 那艘大船勉強通過了那開合式橋樑的缺口。

sentences.english: He gave her the money reluctantly.
sentences.chinese: 他勉勉強強地給了她錢。

sentences.english: I have little money, but I can squeeze by till the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 我沒多少錢了，但還能勉強熬到月底。

sentences.english: They do not scold them and do not make them attend classes at all.
sentences.chinese: 既不責罵學生也不勉強他們上課。

sentences.english: She spent three years at college, scraping along on an allowance from her parents.
sentences.chinese: 她靠父母的津貼勉勉強強地在大學裏度過了三年。

sentences.english: Frank begged him to do so and the dealer reluctantly prised it open.
sentences.chinese: 經弗蘭懇求，古董商才勉強把貨箱撬開了。

sentences.english: The Conservative Party barely squeaked through in parliament.
sentences.chinese: 保守黨在議會里勉強獲勝。

sentences.english: She mouthed the drug and then swallowed it reluctantly.
sentences.chinese: 她把藥含在嘴裏，然後勉強地嚥了下去。

sentences.english: She spent three years at the liberal arts college, scraping along on an allowance from her parents.
sentences.chinese: 她靠父母的津貼勉勉強強地在文科大學裏度過了三年。

definition: there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
to renounce/to abandon/to give up
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
to bear fruit/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Lian
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
final/ultimate
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
if (coming after a conditional clause)
habit/custom/usual practice/to be used to/CL:個|个[ge4]
perhaps/maybe
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to recognize/to know/to admit
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
this kind of/so/this way/like this/such
although/even though/even if
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
